episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including how babies practice their first words, the origin of Nike trainers in a waffle iron, rats dreaming of places they want to visit, and the historical use of milk as paint before it was consumed as a drink.

facts.fact: Babies practice their first words before saying them out loud, which is very sweet.
The first pair of Nike trainers were made in a waffle iron.
Rats dream of places they want to visit.
Humans used milk as paint for 40,000 years before anyone thought to drink it.
